x_snc_devtools_technical_debt.description: The function ValidateInstance() is depreacted. The function TargetInstancevalidate() should be used instead. The new function follows a naming convention to group all functions that communicate with the Deployer Target API.
x_snc_devtools_technical_debt.short_description: Function ValidateInstance() is deprecated - replaced by TargetInstanceValidate()
x_snc_devtools_technical_debt.sys_name: Function ValidateInstance() is deprecated - replaced by TargetInstanceValidate()
